welcome_message_body: Welcome to Redding, where the natural beauty of the surrounding mountains and the Sacramento River meet. Enjoy our charming downtown, outdoor recreational opportunities, and vibrant arts scene while you're here!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redding Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Redding Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Red Bluff Fss Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Red Bluff Fss Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
